storyInfo: Saria gets taken out by a sniper and the Doctor encounters a threat. The military and the Vice President reach a tentative settlement. In the midst of all the panic, the most unexpected person appears.

attributes.content: Silence! Finally! Ever since I entered the city I've been wondering when I would get to see you...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Um... S-Silence?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Ifrit, come over here.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Don't worry, Silence. I'm all good here, good enough to knock out a row of bad guys while carrying you in one arm and running laps around them! If you don't believe me, I'll even carry Saria with my other arm just to prove it! Ha... haha...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Stop speaking for a bit, you'll affect the drone readings.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Oh... okay.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Silence lowers her head to examine Ifrit, just like she used to do, with the same meticulous and gentle manner as ever, but Ifrit still feels very nervous.
She has never been scared of Silence getting angry at her.
One of the first things she learned growing up was that Silence's anger stemmed from a concern for her.
She knows that after Silence is angry, she helps her take care of the things that were doing her harm, and helps her chase off the things that were scaring her.
It was not real anger.
But Ifrit is scared of this silent Silence.
When Silence does not show an ounce of anger, and rather, is quieter than usual, she realizes—
Something must have hit Silence's limit.
The skies in Trimounts are always gloomy and grey, and the storm clouds are as big as monsters. No wonder you used to always walk into my room with your hair all drenched.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Oh, and 'hot dogs,' do you like 'em? The Doctor bought some for me and Rosmontis, and I wanna try one with strawberry-flavored syrup next time.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Silence...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I decided to come here myself. I bothered Dr. Kal'tsit about it for a long time, and also wrote the Doctor a super long letter.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I completed all my courses and trainings in the last few years, I can do a whole lot of missions, just like you and Saria...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Blood Originium-Crystal Density has slightly increased.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: What are the estimated rates of increase for that and for Cell-Fusion Assimilation?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: For now, they're within controllable ranges.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: We won't know the rest of the results until Ifrit returns to the landship for a comprehensive examination.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You want me to return to the landship... you guys still don't trust me...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: No, Ifrit. I trust you.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: There shouldn't be a need for any 'buts' here with Saria around!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Four years ago, it was in this very city, and under the very same signboard.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I almost lost you forever. Back then, she was at your side too, no different than right now.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But I lived, and I've been living good! Saria protected me, so this time I can protect you and everyone with her!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Ifrit, listen to Silence. She's your doctor, and you should trust her the most.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: But I trust you too! I trust the Doctor, and Rosmontis too, there's no difference in the amount of trust I have in you guys.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Saria, I saw you the other day. You were with that mysterious man in a trenchcoat, at Triton Factory in District 13. And on the very same day, something fell from the sky.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: So you were there too.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Just another Rhine-related secret experiment, right?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Of course you won't answer. Because... this is you trying to 'protect' me and Ifrit.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Just ten minutes ago, Ifrit stopped an assassination attempt on the Vice President.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm not trying to conceal information from you, Silence, but what I have on hand is also very limited. There are simply too many different factions involved in this, and all I can do is try my best to prevent the situation from deteriorating even further.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: 'We must put this back on the right track'—I've heard that line from Director Saria too many times.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You were always in control of the situation back at Rhine Lab, but those horrifying experiments kept popping up, one after another.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: There will always be someone hurt by the ambitions of another, and these wounds won't simply be healed by criminal charges and trials... Not to mention, a trial that should never have happened in the first place.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I can't help but wonder... when you people finally extinguish this fire, just how many will be left lying in the ruins, breathing their last breaths just like Ifrit was?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You perceive the situation more thoroughly and clearly than I can.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But you still choose out of habit, to help them 'control.' You hope to minimize any damage, and preferably, shrink it until it becomes unnoticeable, rather than put a stop to the immorality at its source.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I can't deny that.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Saria... I've been waiting years to ask you a question.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Your inability to make a genuine stand against Rhine, is it because deep in your bones, you've always been the same as them...? The same as Control?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Sniper!
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Silence, get down! Ifrit—
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: What—
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: S... Saria...?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: White calcium crystals float before her eyes.
They had briefly protected her and Ifrit just moments ago, but now they disintegrate silently as the caster falls.
Confirmed hit on the target!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Great.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: This high-powered energy weapon is capable of blasting a hole open through an armored vehicle, and yet it wasn't able to penetrate her Arts.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: This damned Vouivre and her Arts are tough as shit, harder than power armor.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: You mean to say... There's a possibility she might survive?
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Heh, 'possibility.' I'm so fed up with that word. All those researchers tossing it around.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: What I want is results, definite results.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Then what happened with the Vice President...
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Maylander won't give us a second chance.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: The op team is still on standby. Should we order them to withdraw?
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: No need. Give them something else to do.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Just like how we dealt with that eyesore of a Vouivre, don't let anyone causing chaos in Rhine get off scot-free.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: It's time for these idiots who think they can do whatever they want with just a few companies under their belts to wake up—
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: No one can challenge the Columbian Army's authority on Columbian soil and get away with it.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Move!
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Blake, I didn't give you Rhine's contacts for you to drag it into the gutter!
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Which is why you've used your channels within Rhine.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: The guilty are often the first to complain, Ferdinand.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Are you aware of our current situation?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Someone disrupted the intel, and the detonator went off too early.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: And now, reporters have already spun the story that this has nothing to do with Jackson at all.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: What did you say?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I said, the assassination failed.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Are you satisfied?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Come on, Ferdinand. Put away whatever weapon you're hiding.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Do you really think you can even leave a scratch on me?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Relax, I don't blame you.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Blake pats Ferdinand's cheek twice.
Ferdinand expected Blake's eyes to be filled with a murderous intent, but to his surprise, all he sees is a smile.
Carrying out an assassination within Rhine given our current intel would have been extremely difficult, even without your meddling.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: And even now, that company's all that's on your mind. Loyalty to your own desires isn't necessarily a bad thing, though.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: I'm serious, Ferdinand. It's an admirable trait.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: You're fit to be a soldier.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: But now that we've failed—
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: What of it? This is just the beginning.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: It's a good thing that Maylander has us pinned down. Do you know just how many of my superiors have been waiting ages to strike out against them?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Before the situation spirals out of control, our losses will only win me more support.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: And if things really spiral—
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Trust me, you don't want to know how things will end for me.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Of course, I can't guarantee how they'll end for you either.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: I'll stick to our agreement, to help you find Kristen.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: We can still turn the tables once we have her in our grasp.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: That goes for the both of us... and Rhine too.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I'll go meet with Jara.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Sure... by all means.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Let's see if it's luck... or fate, that will catch up to us first.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Squad A, search that side.
attributes.name: Defense Section Employee?

attributes.content: Squad B, conduct your search over here.
attributes.name: Defense Section Employee?

attributes.content: Our targets are a hooded figure with no weapon, and a Feline girl able to use highly lethal Arts.
attributes.name: Defense Section Employee?

attributes.content: Doctor, my terminal lit up.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: That means... it's time for me and Ifrit to meet up, but I can't sense her presence.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: She probably found Saria.;Our plan has succeeded.
Rhine should be safe for now.

attributes.content: This place... isn't safe at all.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: There are too many laboratories here. They all have the same white walls, just like a maze.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Ifrit hates this kind of place the most. Whenever she talks about those memories, her breaths become shorter and her hands get cooler than usual.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I want to go find her. I don't want to see my friend get hurt.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: These walls aren't so tough. Just give me the order and I can get you out of here easily.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: Let's not be hasty...;We can't expose ourselves yet.

attributes.content: Thank you very much for choosing not to smash up our walls. We imported the material from Kazimierz. They're very expensive.
There's no need to be so nervous, little girl. As you can clearly see, I'm only a businessman. Nothing but a fountain pen and a wallet in my pocket.

attributes.options: It's you...;Hello there.
I didn't expect to see you here, Director Fitzroy.

attributes.content: Haha, sure enough. My next meeting just happens to be around the corner, so I figured I would greet our guests on my way over.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: ...Areas C and D have been searched.
attributes.name: Defense Section Employee?

attributes.content: There's a ton of conference rooms in front, prepare to check them one by one.
attributes.name: Defense Section Employee?

attributes.content: Enemies in the corridors, and a lot of them too.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Give me the order, Doctor.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: Wait.;......;We have company.

attributes.content: A hero working behind the scenes to prevent a terrible conspiracy, but soon to become the target of a clandestine arrest.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: In Columbia, these sorts of stories are common enough, and such a script wouldn't fetch a good price in Wrankwood.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: At the end of the day, is it a party being obstructed by the establishment and wanting to punish them for it, or the other party dispatching a commission to let this yet-to-be-exposed deal sink into the abyss—
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: What do you think?
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.options: Seems like there's no need for guesses here.;They all have 'reasons' to 'investigate' us.
You included, Director Fitzroy.
Surely you showed up here at this moment for more than a greeting?

attributes.content: Oops, would you just look at the time! They're waiting for me to start our meeting.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: I hope I haven't disrupted your plans too much just by stalling you a bit?
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: Doctor, please stand back. I'm going to begin attacking.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: ...Director Fitzroy.

attributes.content: My friends call me Justin Jr.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.options: Justin Jr.
The military seeing us together won't be good for you.

attributes.content: What if I told them that the young and beautiful Feline lady by your side has something to do with a top-secret military experiment that should rightfully be covered in dust and long unused?
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.options: Is that a threat from an enemy?;Is that a reminder from a friend?

attributes.content: The choice lies with you.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: Do remind me, just how many of our excellent employees have you already poached from Rhine Lab? Was it eight, or ten?
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: Jara has been thinking about getting acquainted with whoever runs your HR.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: Since Rhodes Island and Rhine Lab have been cooperating so closely—the next time we meet, I might even have a contract for you with an offer you can't refuse.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.options: Looking forward to it.;......;Rhodes Island thanks you for your interest.

attributes.content: Alright, I won't bother you and Miss Feline here any longer. By the way, Dr. {@nickname}, after you get back, please do ask Muelsyse a question for me—
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: When she goes out to eat, what's her preferred cuisine?
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: Only one conference room left. The target is most likely inside.
attributes.name: Defense Section Employee?

attributes.content: Prepare to breach.
attributes.name: Defense Section Employee?

attributes.content: ...It's empty?
attributes.name: Defense Section Employee?

attributes.content: Did you hear a sound just now?
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: What sound?
attributes.name: Defense Section Employee?

attributes.content: The sound of water. Ah, how wonderful it is.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: It's... a lively energy, strong enough to fight even fate itself.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: Saria... Saria!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: She's not responding... no way...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Her head's suffered a serious impact, and though her vital signs are there, she's still in critical condition. She needs emergency treatment.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Ifrit, help me lift her arms... ugh, so heavy...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Don't even think about hurting Saria again!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Silence, I can burn a way out for us, and we can go try and meet up with the Doctor.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: No. The people watching us are definitely also after Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Yes, the military is already inside Rhine, and your friends might not be able to protect themselves.
Director Jara...?!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Come with me, kids.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I can't just sit by and watch the other founder of Rhine Lab fall here.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Mr. Vice President, Congress called back. It's regarding the bill to dismantle those military bases, they're ready to move the hearing up.
attributes.name: Vice President's Secretary

attributes.content: In addition, the Justice who reached out to us earlier has hinted that she's willing to cooperate with us to overturn the previous ruling.
attributes.name: Vice President's Secretary

attributes.content: The military is going to pay for their recklessness. We have an optimistic estimate that Colonel Blake will be out of Trimounts within the next twelve hours.
attributes.name: Vice President's Secretary

attributes.content: Everything is waiting for your decision, sir.
attributes.name: Vice President's Secretary

attributes.content: A call should be coming in, Pavard.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Yes, this is the Vice President's temporary office... Yes, he's right next to me... Yes...
attributes.name: Vice President's Secretary

attributes.content: Mr. Vice President, it's...
attributes.name: Vice President's Secretary

attributes.content: Hand it over, I know who's looking for me.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: ...Alright.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: I understand. I feel the same. I'm not about to let everyone down at this critical juncture.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Mr. Vice President, about the bill...
attributes.name: Vice President's Secretary

attributes.content: Shelve it. There's no need to put this matter on the agenda for the next six months.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Is that... an order from the Maylander Foundation?
attributes.name: Vice President's Secretary

attributes.content: Pavard, how many casualties were there in that mess from your report?
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: We eliminated thirty military operatives.
attributes.name: Vice President's Secretary

attributes.content: And how much money do we spend on training these soldiers every year?
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Three million to train a combat-ready man to DOD standards, sir.
attributes.name: Vice President's Secretary

attributes.content: So we basically just lost 90 million in cash and 30 outstanding talents.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: ...That's right.
attributes.name: Vice President's Secretary

attributes.content: So, there's no need to ask whose orders it is. It's a decision that's in the best interests of Columbia.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Go get me a meeting with Blake. It's time for us and the DOD to work together.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Vice President's Secretary

attributes.content: I'll always remember the day the election results came in, when I thought smugly to myself that I could finally sit behind the desk of my dreams—and I received the biggest shock of my life.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Haha. Back then, I almost thought my country was caught up in a huge conspiracy.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: But I've come to realize that's not what's happening.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Columbia isn't wrapped up in any conspiracy, and Maylander isn't the shadow government I thought it was.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: It's just silly things happening in an orderly way, that's what makes it seem like we've been making real progress.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: But I'm still just a regular guy. Every now and then, something crazy pops into my head.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: If I really was caught in that explosion, then... would I be remembered as a martyr for Columbia? Or just tossed in the dustbin of history as some incompetent politician?
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: What... do you think?
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: The Vice President looks around the empty office, as if waiting for the omnipresent air to answer his question.
Then, the man standing so close to the apex of Columbian power sighs.
The military won't be bothering you any longer, so why the long face?
...Ho'olheyak, you are a difficult woman to reach.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Sorry about that. My boss, who I've not seen in a long time, has popped on over to Trimounts. I needed some time to compile my reports.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I'm afraid the Tin Man has forgot to send me any copies.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: And that's why I've come to answer your question personally. As long as it's something I know, I'm happy to tell all.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Alright, you're the primary representative for the Maylander Foundation's Rhine Lab desk. So, tell me—
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Where exactly is the main instigator of all this malarkey? Where is Kristen Wright right now?
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: She's in a place that not even the finest of Columbia's commandos are able to reach, a place never documented by the Maylander Foundation.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: There's nowhere in Columbia like that.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: It's not on any map of the country, at least for now. Even though the location might overlap with our territory, it is truly out of our line of sight.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: So you mean...
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Mr. Vice President, you are no doubt familiar with 'Project Exploration', an archaeological undertaking spanning multiple years led by the Maylander Historical Association... or rather, our Tin Man.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Those ancient ruins buried under the vast wasteland.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Exactly. Coincidentally, we also came across this information during a recent raid operation on Rhine-related personnel.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Exploration records?
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: These records are currently in the hands of a former executive of Rhine Lab, a close friend of Kristen Wright's... as well as an offshore company with an existing criminal record in Columbia.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: And it is the most coincidental thing, that this company called Rhodes Island has a working relationship with my dear leader, the Tin Man.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: ...A water purification and circulation system.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You could also call it a 'sewage drain.'
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: It used to have another name, 'Locus of Sorcery.' Once the most primitive weapons of witchcraft from the Teekaz.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So that's its actual full name. To think that it was installed on the Pioneer Team's nomadic temporary housing.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Though it's certain that the device's core components have already long been lost.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: All that is left are the outermost pipes, and you people... had a reasonable idea of how to recycle it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I will take that as a compliment on behalf of the Columbians, Madame.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: This country has gone through hard times. During the Great Expansion when supplies were scarce, every object was classified into only one of two qualities: useful or useless.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: This may be a medium of some magnificent memories in your eyes, but to the ordinary people living in Columbia, they are useful pipes that will not be rusting anytime soon.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: After all, no matter how old an object is, or how great an era it has seen, those unable to be comprehended by people of the current era will be no different from scrap.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Our own levels of understanding are but restricted by our own time and space. You and I are not exempt either... and the same goes for Kristen Wright.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She couldn't have drawn her power from a Teekaz-like legacy, and whatever outside force she has borrowed power from is much more powerful than that.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: There are still thirty-two technologies waiting to be ruled out. Most of these are not on the Maylander Historical Association's exploration records.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I presume you won't be needing my company for whatever is coming next.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Sure enough. But this will not affect our partnership with Maylander.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yes, indeed. This has always been your way of going about things.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: You're hoping that Kristen will not get hold of that technology... but you also hope that Columbia won't be able to prematurely pocket that fortune for themselves. Still the same as always... selfless and neutral.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: I have one more thing to ask of you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We can discuss that first, Madame.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}... and those two girls.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As you've said, there are some roads that only I can take. I'd like to trouble you to take care of them when it's inconvenient for me to do so.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Oh, I've misjudged you. You have changed after all, Madame. You're more humane than you once were.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: No one, or thing is forever unchangeable, Revenant... Mr. Tin Man. All we can do is to accept these changes.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hey, Doctor, you good?
Hmm, I should rein in the water and not let it enter the respiratory tract...
Or could it be... that my skills have gotten rusty after not using them for so long?
The Doctor probably bumped that hood on something and passed out.
Ahh—so sorry!
It's all cause of that Justin Jr., he suddenly dumped a stack of papers on me, said all the directors have to fill them out or we won't get our funding for next year.
That was close, I almost didn't make it.

attributes.options: *cough* *cough*...;......;Didn't make it to what?

attributes.content: Oh, you're awake, Doctor.
Good morning... no, good evening.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: This isn't Rhine.;......;I remember being in a ventilation duct—

attributes.content: Yup. I was manipulating my water around when I knew you were in trouble.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: The two of you were about to be discovered when I found you, so I wrapped you up in water and brought you here.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I was in a hurry, so excuse the bumpy ride, 'kay?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: I owe you one.;......;I can't repay the kindness you've shown me.

attributes.content: You've saved me once, and now I got you back... Oh, who knows whose turn it'll be next?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Doctor, you're not thinking of how you're gonna repay me, are you?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Um... how about you go shopping with me next time?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: It's not that great a deal, hehe.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: But you know, if you insist on returning the favor, just sign this employment contract I got here! I wouldn't mind having an assistant with brains as big as yours.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Doctor... I know you just woke up, but, I gotta tell you some bad news.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: It seems like Saria got attacked at the same time you were.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: Is she okay?;......;What about Ifrit?

attributes.content: I'm not sure about the specifics, but that's Saria, you know? Harder than diamonds! She wouldn't be in any serious danger, right?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: The big question is what you do next. You must've gotten the feeling that once the military gives you a warning, they don't give up so easily.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: So your situation here is... Actually, Rhodes Island's situation is far from hunky-dory.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Iffy should be fine and dandy, but Saria...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I'm not sure about the specifics, but that's Saria, you know? Harder than diamonds! She wouldn't be in any serious danger, right?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: The big question is what you do next. You must've gotten the feeling that once the military gives you a warning, they don't give up so easily.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: So your situation here is... Actually, Rhodes Island's situation is far from hunky-dory.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: Rosmontis...
Rosmontis?

attributes.content: Outside...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: The corridor... someone is walking toward us.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: But I was so cautious on the way here, the army couldn't possibly have tailed us that easily.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Or could it be the Maylander guys? Like... Mr. Tin Can and his pets...? Secret agents like to pop up like this, don't they?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: Rosmontis, is it the Tin Man?

attributes.content: I don't know.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I don't feel anything special... the feeling I'm getting is... um, very normal...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: Muelsyse, can you take a look around the area?

attributes.content: Hm? You want me to send a few 'eyes' out there? You got it.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Huff...*pant*...finally...
Sorry, am I late?
I wanted to see you as soon as you got to Trimounts. Unfortunately... my work took much longer than expected.
You're...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Wait, I remember that mug from the docs... You're Loken Williams?!
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Lo...ken?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Yes. It is I.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: You must have received my letter, Narcissa.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Who is Narcissa?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: My name is Rosmontis. It's my only name.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You... no matter. What's important is that you've come. To tell the truth, I've been a bit nervous ever since I sent the letter.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: To see that you're willing to meet me... makes me a very happy man.
attributes.name: Loken
